change.head: Updated 'Level Select'
change.paragraph: You can now load different versions of the plaza using Y + C-stick, and the airstrip using X + L. The FLUDD cutscenes on the airstrip no longer reset the timer or accept level shortcuts.

change.head: Added 'Force Plaza Events'
change.paragraph: Forces events to happen on certain versions of the plaza.

change.head: Updated 'Infinite Lives'
change.paragraph: The code no longer sets the life count to 99, which would persist on save files.

change.head: Removed 'Persistent FMV skips'
change.paragraph: Use FMV Skips instead.

change.head: Updated 'Position/angle/speed display'
change.paragraph: Fixed a buffer overflow which caused a crash upon starting the manta fight, and ported the code to JP 1.1.

change.head: twice
change.paragraph: Fixed a timing issue which caused a crash when reloading the Sirena 8 hotel with Level Select.

change.head: Updated Stage Loader
change.paragraph: The coin counter is now reset upon entering a main world.

change.head: Updated 'Shine Get Timer'
change.paragraph: The timer now pauses during load times.

change.head: Updated 'Level Select'
change.paragraph: Added a new reset shortcut, Y, which doesn’t reload into the park or the hotel.

change.head: Added 'Respawn One-Time Shines'
change.paragraph: Respawns Shines obtained from the bells, the Shine Gate and Shine graffitis.

change.head: Updated 'Shine Get Timer' and 'Shine Touch Timer'
change.paragraph: Improved compatibility with ISO hacks.

change.head: Fixed 'Shine Get Timer' and 'Shine Touch Timer'
change.paragraph: The previous update made them start at the wrong time on all versions except PAL.

change.head: Fixed Box Game timer in 'Shine Get Timer' and 'Shine Touch Timer'
change.paragraph: The box game timer is no longer affected by the timer codes.

change.head: Added 'Intro skip'
change.paragraph: Allows to reach the title screen faster upon booting or resetting the game.

change.head: Updated 'Level Select'
change.paragraph: Resetting in Pinna 1 can no longer bring up the park owner's dialogue or the Shine spawn, resetting in Sirena 5 no longer loads Sirena 4, episode names fixed when resetting into the park or hotel.

change.head: Fixed 'Level Select'
change.paragraph: The shortcut for any episode 1 would reset the game and all shortcuts in the Secrets category would load Bianco 3.

change.head: Updated 'Level Select'
change.paragraph: Z can now reload main levels that weren't initially entered using Level Select, and Hotel Delfino without letting Mario move earlier than normal. Reloading Casino Delfino with Z is no longer possible unless it was specifically loaded with C-down + X.

change.head: Added 'Infinite Juice'
change.paragraph: Prevents Yoshi from running out of juice and despawning.

change.head: Updated 'DPad Functions'
change.paragraph: Position codes now save camera angle.

change.head: Merged 'Fade-in Timer' into 'Shine Touch Timer'
change.paragraph: 'Shine Touch Timer' now starts on the last black frame before taking control of Mario, matching the timing method for IL leaderboards on speedrun.com.

change.head: Updated 'Level Select'
change.paragraph: Fixed Pinna 8 always skipping to the Shine after you beat it once.

change.head: Updated 'Position/angle/speed display'
change.paragraph: Fixed a error in the US and PAL codes that caused wrong output on Dolphin and a crash on console.

change.head: Added 'Position/angle/speed display'
change.paragraph: Not available on JP A for now as it was made using the C kit.

change.head: Added 'Fade-in Timer'
change.paragraph: A new variant of the in-game timer, starting on the last black frame before taking control of Mario rather than before the demo.

change.head: Updated 'DPad Functions'
change.paragraph: Added a remote grab code in place of Yoshi/nozzles unlock (X + Up), which exists as standalone codes.

change.head: Updated Stage Loader
change.paragraph: Fixed gpApplication address for US and JP A.

change.head: Updated 'Level Select'
change.paragraph: Mashing through cutscenes with B no longer causes the game to reset.

change.head: Updated Stage Loader
change.paragraph: Fixed some repeated/missing segments in the presets and 'Not in Pinna' FMV skips for JP A.

change.head: Updated 'Disable Blue Coin Flag'
change.paragraph: The blue coin counter now increases as normal and gets reset on area transitions.

change.head: Updated Stage Loader
change.paragraph: The code is now able to load the airstrip and any version of the plaza. Added new presets with plaza movement, including 96 Shines and 120 Shines. Added new route endings. Changed the conditional FMV skips option from 'Not in Pinna 1' to 'Not in Pinna', no longer making the Pinna unlock cutscene skippable.

change.head: Updated 'DPad Functions' and Stage Loader
change.paragraph: Skipping Yes/No textboxes now acts as a Yes.

change.head: Removed 'Codes Optimizer'
change.paragraph: Its only noticeable effect was to break the timer codes.

change.head: Added 'Any Fruit Opens Yoshi Eggs'
change.paragraph: Yoshi still asks for a specific fruit but bringing him another one will open the egg anyway.

change.head: Added 'Persistent FMV Skips'
change.paragraph: Makes FMVs skippable in newly created save files.

change.head: Added 'Codes Optimizer'
change.paragraph: Prevents the codes that only need to run once from running every frame.

change.head: Removed Original IGT (Deprecated)
change.paragraph: Use Shine Get/Touch timer instead.

change.head: Fixed Stage Loader.
change.paragraph: The previous version didn’t reset properly after the first use if the route ending was the title screen, and reloaded the last level upon exiting area in Corona.

change.head: Added new stages to the loader.
change.paragraph: You can now select the Gooper Blooper fight from Ricco 1, the rollercoaster ride from Pinna 8, the King Boo fight from Sirena 5, the bottle from Noki 3 and the underwater area from Noki 8.

change.head: Fixed timer compatibility in Fast Any% and Stage Loader.
change.paragraph: The timer didn’t reset in Corona.

change.head: Added 'Replace Episode names with their ID' for all versions.
change.paragraph: Previously only available for NTSC-U.

change.head: Fixed Stage Loader.
change.paragraph: An error in the generator caused it to output malformed codes.

change.head: Added Unlock Yoshi.
change.paragraph: Standalone equivalent to X+Up on the DPad Functions.

change.paragraph: Fixed the injection address.

change.head: Updated Stage Loader.
change.paragraph: Exiting area or dying now reloads the current stage instead of moving on.
Added IW and ASIW presets.
Added options for what to do after the last level; removed Corona and Bowser from the regular level choices.

change.head: Integrated Noki Dokis Stage Loader.
change.paragraph: Integrated Noki Doki’s Stage Loader into the Generator.

change.paragraph: Shortened the code by a few lines.

change.paragraph: Makes the correct episode names appear in the demo cutscenes and the pause menu in Fast Any%.

change.head: Added 'Remove Save Boxes'.
change.paragraph: Adds the option to have save boxes removed outside of 'Fast Any%'

change.head: Made 'Fast Any%' compatible with the timers.
change.paragraph: Makes it possible to use the Shine Get and Shine Touch timer in combination with Fast Any%

change.head: Updated guides.

change.paragraph: Added JP-A port for all codes.

change.paragraph: Added <a href="ios58.html"> a guide on how to install IOS58.

Plaza Yoshi Unlock in 'D-Pad Functions'.

change.paragraph: Always enables FMV Skips outside Pinna 1.

change.head: Added 'Download for Gecko Cheat Manager' option.
change.paragraph: Added option to download codes formatted for the Gecko Cheat Manager.

change.head: Made timers stop after the bowser fight.
change.paragraph: Timers now also allow to time Corona properly, by stopping them when hitting the last platform during the bowser fight.

change.head: Fixed Pinna not resetting inside the park on PAL.
Fixed 'Free Pause' compatibility with 'Shine Get Timer'.
change.paragraph: Fixed 'Free Pause' incompatibility with 'Shine Get Timer' caused by them injecting code in the same address.

change.head: Added 'Download for Dolphin' button.
change.paragraph: Added download button to get the codes formatted for Dolphin.

change.head: Added 'Fast 79 Shines' for NTSC-U.
change.paragraph: Same concept as 'Fast Any%'.

change.head: Seperated 'Free Pause' and 'Exit Area everywhere'.
change.paragraph: Seperated these two codes again since they don't depend on each other.

change.head: Updated 'Level Select'. Added 'Shine Touch Timer'. Marked original IGT as deprecated.
change.paragraph: The Original Ingame Timer has been marked as deprecated. You can still find it on the bottom of the codelist though if you still want to use it. Instead, there are now two other timers:

• Shine Touch Timer: Starts on the last black frame of the loading screen and ends when you touch the shine.
  • Shine Get Timer: Starts on the last black frame of the loading screen and ends when the Shine Get animation starts (similiar to the x-cam timer of SM64).

Since the Shine Get timer contained a way better Level Select, the Level Select code has been replaced with the one from the timer. It includes the most recent fixes and also has some maintenance advantages.
Timer Changes:

• Changed timing (see above).
  • Resets on death.
  • Resets when using Shine Select.
  • Only uses existing timers for Piantissimo, Sirena/Pianta 6 and Ricco 2 underground.
  • Fixed Pinna 8 HUD.
Known Bugs:

• Can't reset Pinna 8 properly after finishing the rollercoaster. Use the cannon to reenter or reset the game instead.
  • Box game timer doesn't work properly.

change.head: Updated Level Select
change.paragraph:
• Mashing A during loading screens doesn't affect your level selection anymore.
  • Pinna game resets have been fixed.
  • Level Names in the intro have been fixed (shoutouts to Noki Doki).
  • Sirena 5 now loads the right casino.
  • Reloading Sirena does no longer respawn you in the Hotel. Reason: You can move earlier than usual if you do that, making it too inaccurate for practice.

change.head: Replaced 'Exit Area Everywhere' and 'Pause Mid-Air' with 'Free Pause'.
change.paragraph: Merged the two codes.

change.head: Added 'Free Pause'
change.paragraph: 'Free Pause' replaces 'Enable Pause Mid-Air' and 'Enable Exit Area Everywhere'. It now also allows you to pause during cutscenes.

change.paragraph: Fixed timer resetting during wrong cutscenes when using 'Exit Area' after touching a Shine.

change.paragraph: Allows you to choose 'Exit Area' in the pause menu on Plaza.

change.head: Added X+DPad combinations to 'DPad Functions'.
change.paragraph: New functions have been added to the DPad Functions:

• X+D-Pad left: No FLUDD in secrets
  • X+D-Pad right: Always FLUDD in secrets
  • X+D-Pad up: Unlock Yoshi in stages
  • X+D-Pad down: Defauld FLUDD behaviour for secrets

change.head: Added 'Enable Pause Mid-Air'.
change.paragraph: Allows you to pause mid-air.

change.head: Added 'Shine outfit'.
change.paragraph: Always wear glasses and the shirt.

change.paragraph: Loads a random stage after exiting of finishing a level.
